short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays YouTube video timecodes from descriptions and comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e: Adds timestamps under the video from the description and comments.
long.en,en_AU,es_419,it,ja,kn,ko,lt,lv,pt_BR,:
If there are timecodes in the description or comments to a YouTube video, the extension catches them and displays them under the video.

So far, the extension only shows the timecodes that you have opened on your computer.
